stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-07.01 — Snapshot & KPI Aggregation (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> SNAPSHOT_INIT : SnapshotStarted (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
note right of SNAPSHOT_INIT
  Initialize aggregation window:
  • wall-clock or governance-driven snapshot
  • bind ParamVersion (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  • allocate run-id for auditability
end note

SNAPSHOT_INIT --> LOAD_INPUTS : WindowBound
note right of LOAD_INPUTS
  Fetch inputs from services:
  • PoC CP/W deltas (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  • Resonance samples (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  • Treasury payouts & reserves (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  • Governance decisions (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  • Hub/project signals (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
end note

LOAD_INPUTS --> COMPUTE_FEATURES : InputsValidated
note right of COMPUTE_FEATURES
  Build feature store:
  • rolling sums / EMA / decay transforms
  • outlier clipping & normalization
  • join by canonical ids
end note

COMPUTE_FEATURES --> COMPUTE_SRI : FeaturesReady
note right of COMPUTE_SRI
  Compute Systemic Resonance Index (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController):
  • aggregate R across domains
  • weighting & alignment factors
  • produce SRI_t and deltas
end note

COMPUTE_SRI --> AGGREGATE_KPIS : SRIComputed (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
note right of AGGREGATE_KPIS
  Aggregate KPIs:
  • CP_i, W_i, project A_j, funding stats
  • coherence trends & alerts
end note

AGGREGATE_KPIS --> PUBLISH : KPIUpdated (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
note right of PUBLISH
  Publish to:
  • UI (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) — dashboards / heatmaps
  • Gov (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) — decision support
  • Treasury (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) — rebalancing
  • Ethics (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) — coherence signals
end note

PUBLISH --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] : SnapshotClosed

%% ---- Integrity / reconciliation paths ----
LOAD_INPUTS --> GAP_DETECTED : MissingInputs / HashMismatch
GAP_DETECTED --> RECONCILE : BackfillRequested
RECONCILE --> LOAD_INPUTS : BackfillCompleted

COMPUTE_FEATURES --> REVIEW : AnomalyDetected
REVIEW --> COMPUTE_FEATURES : ClearedByReview
REVIEW --> FAILED : IntegrityBreach

PUBLISH --> RETRY : PublishError
RETRY --> PUBLISH : PublishRetried

FAILED --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] : SnapshotFailed
